title: After Downtime and patch patcher window is wrong size
body: Just logged in after the servers went down after beta released in all queues. My launcher window is too small for the launcher graphic and I cannot click to accept the terms.

replies.body:
Hey there, thanks for bringing your issue to the Help and Support boards!

Can you try resetting your DPI to 100% and see if the issue persists? To do so, please follow these steps:

First, open your Control Panel. You can do this from the Start menu. When the panel opens, click on Appearance and Personalization:

http://i.imgur.com/yiH8MNF.png

Then, click on Display:

http://i.imgur.com/HYwsJCF.png

And finally, select the "Smaller - 100% (default)" option, then click Apply:

http://i.imgur.com/ewCCHkf.png

Re-launch your patcher after that and let me know if you're still having issues. :)

I am a programmmer. But not at Riot though. I can tell about the cause. When they calculate the size of the windows they use the 100% size fonts as scale of the window. But they use the 125% font to print to the window. That is why so much of the text and graphical elements are coming outside of the window if you have 125% in the dpi settings.

Riot games must change their algorithm in the program so they use the same algorithm to calculate size of the window and when they draw the elements.

Just to comment on this:

This is a bug we are aware of and are working on.  

In the meantime, these steps are straightforward and will resolve your issue! ^.^
